name: Mushroomancer
description:
Welcome to Mushroomancer, a short game created by MECA's Junior class of 2019. In this puzzle game, your goal is to harvest rare mushrooms through combining other mushrooms! Advance through each unique level as they increase in difficulty.

TIPS:
- Use the pause menu to display mushroom combinations.

- Use the button that shows two arrows to switch between your selected spore.
